text:
-Here, it was quiet.
No sound of anyone's breathing.
Only the sound of their own heartbeat could be heard.

A vacuum, zero-gravity space.
Soundless, no sensation of body weight.

—Was the Kaibutsu defeated?
Are the others safe?

Just before their memory completely blanked out,
they were sure to have won together with the heroes.

[Player] quietly
opened their eyes. However,
they were still in darkness.

There was no starlight around.
—But, they weren't scared.

...For some reason, they were enveloped
in something warm, a comforting
sensation of reassurance—

name: Orbiter
text:
—[Player].
Thank goodness...
You've woken up.

A familiar voice
gently echoed in the darkness.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Oh, right.
Sorry, it was pitch black, wasn't it?

name: Orbiter
text:
It was my first time
having a person inside, so I forgot.
I'll make it so you can see right away.

In front of them was Earth.
The space they were in just moments ago was visible.

Their vision was cut off and restricted,
as if they were wearing a helmet.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Yes, that's right.
[Player], you fainted and collapsed.

name: Orbiter
text:
...It felt like you would
just float away somewhere.

name: Orbiter
text:
And I was scared...
So I had you come inside me.

name: Orbiter
text:
...It's strange, isn't it?
Having a person inside me.
...It feels a little weird.

name: Orbiter
text:
...But, for some reason,
it feels very calming.

Orbiter quietly
spoke to [Player], who was inside.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, [Player].
You know, just now, I remembered
a little bit of the past.

name: Orbiter
text:
My body, unlike everyone else's,
can't eat delicious food,
and can't sleep with anyone.

name: Orbiter
text:
-But, after all,
I was human.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], I want you to see it too.
My memories.

name: Orbiter
text:
Is it okay if I connect
the neuro-interface to you, [Player]?

name: Orbiter
text:
It's a brainwave link,
so it's not like connecting anything physically...
Is connecting with me... scary?

options.text: ...It's a little scary, but I'm fine with it.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Yeah.
Thank you, [Player].
Relax and don't tense up.

name: Orbiter
text:
These are my—
Recalled memories.

Along with those words,
[Player] was enveloped in a gentle drowsiness.

—And, slightly hazy memories, like a dream,
flowed into [Player].

—『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』
Record my voice.

Someone quietly muttered.
Their voice, though moist as if
they had cried, sounded calm.

...It's sudden, but I want you to listen.
The oxygen left in this spacesuit is
—Only a little left.

I don't think there will be anyone
to hear this recording.
But...

But, someday, somewhere,
the possibility that someone
will hear it isn't zero.

The voice continued quietly.
As if uttering those words had meaning.

So, I want to tell you from the beginning.
...What happened on the
planet where I was born—

An interstellar war
with other planets began.

...I was chosen as a
battleship's spacewalker.

A sad voice could be heard.
The person must have shaken their head.
The sound of fabric rubbing together was heard.

...During my spacewalk session,
there was an attack from enemy forces.
I remember my lifeline being cut.

After I was flung from the mothership,
I lost consciousness for a
while due to some impact.

When I woke up, the self-rescue
mobility device was also damaged.
...I haven't been able to contact the mothership either.

After that voice, the sound of communication initialization
could be heard, but only static-like noise flowed from it.

...Just now, I conducted the
final communication test.
The result is as you heard.

I probably won't be able to
return to the mothership anymore.

A faint, hazy sigh that
wasn't even a sigh could be heard.

...Since then,
I've been by myself.
No-

Orbiter, you were there, so
I was able to maintain my sanity.

...Orbiter, if you weren't there,
I probably would have broken down.
Thank you, Orbiter.

...Thanks to you,
I realized what I needed to do.

—I'm still alive.
So, until the end,
I have to face it.

...『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』
Show me the scenery outside.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『-Awaiting confirmation.
Interrupt mental care program
and release vision?』

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『Considering your physical condition,
interruption of the care program at this point is not recommended.
Are you sure you want to proceed?』

The person must have nodded.
The image of the grassland that
had spread before their eyes vanished.

And, endlessly stretching,
a sea of darkness and starlight—
Space was displayed.
—Beautiful...

The person held their breath.
They only muttered that single word.

—It had always been right before their eyes.
But, once realizing they couldn't reach anywhere from here,
they had turned their back on space.

Beyond the artificial images that covered it,
countless stars shone as far as the eye could see.

Just quietly, sparkling.
Flickering like burning flames,
like hope that continues to burn—

...Even if no one is watching,
the stars are always shining, aren't they?
That's right, I finally remembered.

I always... wanted to be an astronaut.
To travel various stars, to adventure,
to walk endlessly through space—

I 'wanted to
be an astronaut'.

Forgetting they had left a message,
looking at something more dazzling than anything else,
the person gazed at the cosmos.

Suppressing the sobs that
threatened to escape, they breathed.
—They are still breathing.

I, have always...
been running away.

But, just before my oxygen ran out,
I wondered if there was anything I could do,
and that thought came to mind.

My life, will soon come to an end.
...It's terrifying to think about.

But, I won't deceive myself anymore.
I want to face it in the end.
Even if, it's too late to regret now...

The voice, about to fade there, again,
continued to speak to "Orbiter",
with determination in their voice.

『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』
Could you save my memories—
My consciousness data to your empty memory?

Before my oxygen runs out, my dream...
The dream I couldn't fulfill—

But, I want to leave the form of that dream,
which 'certainly existed', somewhere.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『-Awaiting confirmation.
The free space in my memory is insufficient
for securing consciousness data.』

...Then,
discard all the combat information
memory installed in you.

Even the mothership's spacewalk data.
To adventure in space...
I don't need any of it anymore.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『Understood. Deleting memory.
However, the free space is still insufficient.』

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『Furthermore, a complete copy of
consciousness data is theoretically impossible.
—Proceed anyway?』

...Yes, that's fine.
As long as my precious dream—
As long as that alone can live on.

name: Orbiter
text:
『Understood. Then,
copying consciousness data will begin.
Neuro-interface, activating—』

"Orbiter" replied with an inorganic response,
and executed the command.

The inside of the spacesuit, now silent again,
began to sound an alarm after a while.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『-Warning.
Oxygen remaining,
below minimum standard.』

name: Orbiter
text:
『Please return to your supply station immediately.
This is a warning for your life support.』

...Thank you, Orbiter.
Stop the alarm.
...I know, it's fine.

The alarm subsided quickly.
And the person
began to cough violently.

From their suppressed mouth,
sparkling powder fluttered.

The person, turning into light as death approached,
was literally wearing their life away.

-Cough, cough...!
Ah, I talked so much,
and used a lot of oxygen...

It might be...
my limit soon...

Why... is this happening?
...I always thought I just wanted
to be at peace quickly...

Just a little more is fine...
I just 'want to live' a little longer,
I can't help but feel that way...

Muttering that, the person
looked at their own body.

Their body was faintly enveloped in a pale light.
From the surface,
it was gradually changing into sparkling powder.
—『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』

And, having resolved themself,
the person inside called out to Orbiter.
They put their hand on the suit's open/close button.

-In my place,
I want you to travel the vast cosmos.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『I apologize.
I cannot travel.
Please, stay here.』

...I'm sorry, Orbiter.
I've already decided.

The person quietly muttered,
and checked the transfer status of the consciousness data.
Most of it was still not finished.

However, their body told them
that there was no more time left.

...『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter.』
Disconnect neuro-interface.
Power down the suit.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『-Warning. Severe problems may occur as a risk.
Are you sure you want to proceed?』

...Proceed.
Thank you for everything so far.
—Orbiter.

Saying that, the person took a deep
breath of the remaining meager oxygen,
and stepped out of the suit with just their body.

By then, their fingertips had already
begun to turn into sparkling powder.

Embracing the spacesuit's helmet,
the person moved their mouth.
..."Orbiter".

In a world without air, without sound,
the person's voice did not echo.
Even so-

The person continued speaking.
It was as if they wanted to leave a living proof,
and to not forget the dream they envisioned.
You, surely-

With their last strength, they gently pushed
the discarded spacesuit, "Orbiter".

So that it wouldn't be confined to this place and its own past,
so that it could go to a free place.

—You can walk
endlessly through this cosmos.

Smiling quietly, they let go of their hand.
Then, their body floated away in the
opposite direction due to the recoil.

name: "Orbiter"
text:
『—Preparation complete.
Shutting down.』

name: Orbiter
text:
—These are my memories.
[Player], you reminded me of them.

Orbiter, as if embracing [Player] who was inside,
wrapped his arms around his own body.

name: Orbiter
text:
...I was very, very sad.
I, that person...
I don't know anything about them.

name: Orbiter
text:
Even so, I was sad, and lonely...
I kept feeling like I was about to cry.

Orbiter muttered quietly.
His voice was trembling.

name: Orbiter
text:
..."Orbiter", you see,
is "the person in my heart".
I can still talk to them.

name: Orbiter
text:
It was "Orbiter" who
helped you, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
After I brought you inside me,
I called out to them.
I want to save this person, I said.

As if to respond,
the internal lamp blinked faintly.

name: Orbiter
text:
...My name,
I got it from "the person in my heart".
Although, it's apparently the identification name for this suit.

name: Orbiter
text:
It's written inside me, apparently.
So, everyone called me that.

name: Orbiter
text:
I always thought that I just
couldn't remember my real name.
...But, I was wrong.

Orbiter loosened his embrace slightly
and placed a hand on his chest.

name: Orbiter
text:
...For a long time, I felt like
I had lost something important.
Like there was a gaping hole inside me.

name: Orbiter
text:
Surely, it was because
I couldn't save the person inside me...
I felt like something was missing.

name: Orbiter
text:
But, I finally understood.
...That person,
entrusting me—

name: Orbiter
text:
Because, they have passed
on their dream to me.

name: Orbiter
text:
My body is different from everyone else's,
so I was very troubled, but...

Like he was about to cry,
Orbiter desperately raised his voice.

name: Orbiter
text:
I, after all,
'wanted to be human'.

To allow someone
inside his own body—

That was, surely, for Orbiter,
something that wasn't 'human-like',
yet he still wanted to protect it.
—The way, that only a heart could feel.

options.text: Isn't that precisely because you're human?

text:
Those words permeated Orbiter's chest,
soaking inside it.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player]...
Thank, you...!
...Thank you, u-uhm...!

name: Orbiter
text:
Uwaaaahhh...!!
Uuugh, sniff...
Waaahhh...!!
Orbiter desperately cried out.

Emotions that couldn't be put into words
welled up and overflowed.

options.text: It's all thanks to you, Orbiter.

text:
Through the neuro-interface, the raw
emotions was transmitted in their rawest form—

At the sounds of Orbiter's sobbing,
[Player] listened to it the entire time.

—After some time passed,
when the tears finally subsided.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...O-Oh, that's—!
Gaisei, Yotaro!
Orbiter has been found!!

At Pubraseer's call,
Orbiter looked around.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Oh, Captain!
And Gaisei and
Yotaro are here too!

name: Orbiter
text:
Thank goodness,
everyone is safe!

name: Gaisei
text:
Yes, this unworthy one is fine.
...And yet, that Kaibutsu,
ah, how I wish to meet it again...!

name: Gaisei
text:
I had a battle with quite a strong opponent,
so I have no regrets.
Indeed, it was correct to accompany you.

name: Yotaro
text:
I never want to face
something like that ever again...
It's utterly outrageous.

name: Yotaro
text:
I'm exhausted...
As expected, I'm 'battered and bruised'
enough to stop observing...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Orbiter.
You seem to be safe somehow.
Have you not seen [Player]?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I've been searching the vicinity,
but I haven't found them yet...

name: Pubraseer
text:
I hope they're not hurt...
Where could they be now—

From inside Orbiter's face display,
[Player] spoke and showed their face.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player] is with me.
They seemed tired, so
I had them rest a little.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I see, that's how it was.
Thank goodness you're safe...
I was really worried...!

name: Gaisei
text:
...[Player]-dono, we still haven't
had our promised battle.
You must rest fully.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun...
Is that really alright?
Well, I was worried too, but...

After informing everyone of their safety,
[Player] pointed behind the three.

There, the moon they had been on
just a moment ago, shone blue.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Amazing.
The moon looks like
it's stained blue...!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah... It's beautiful.
The Ether that the Kaibutsu had been
consuming must have overflowed.

name: Pubraseer
text:
The moon, is shining brightly.
It's a sight you can only see from space.

name: Yotaro
text:
Indeed... It's beautiful.
I never thought I'd get
to see such a scene.

name: Gaisei
text:
...I don't know about its scenic
value, but as a proof of victory
for me, it is not a bad view.

The group gently drifted in space,
looking down at the colossal moon.
It was a fantastical sight.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Speaking of which,
if the Ether scatters,
won't Kaibutsu be drawn to it...?

name: Yotaro
text:
No, there's a reactor very close by,
so it'll probably be automatically collected
back into the reactor soon enough.

name: Yotaro
text:
Although the concentration is so dense it's visible,
it's probably much lower than what
would cause the reactor to explode.

name: Yotaro
text:
Besides, there's no Kaibutsu presence now.
I don't think there's much to worry about.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, the Kaibutsu that were drawn
to the Ether were just defeated.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Just in case, it would be good to tell
the heroes waiting on the moon, but—

name: Pubraseer
text:
Seeing this scenery here is
a privilege only we have!

name: Orbiter
text:
...Eheheh, that's right!
We defeated
the Kaibutsu, didn't we!

name: Orbiter
text:
Once [Player]'s stamina recovers a little more,
I'll use my power to return to the moon!

name: Orbiter
text:
Until then, just a little—
I want to keep looking at this scenery.

The group nodded at Orbiter's words.
And, embraced by space,
they savored the peace they had won.

Finale:
Azure Dawn

name: Yotaro
text:
—Well then, [Player].
This is as far as we go.

—Archimedes Colony.
A high ground overlooking the "Pillar of Light".

Yotaro and Gaisei stopped,
and [Player] and the others turned around.

options.text: I see, so it's goodbye to the two of you.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, as expected, we can't go to a place where heroes gather.
The condition for this time was to let us go, you see.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, we'll keep our promise.
You two did more than
what was asked of you.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I'll also tell
Denebola about you.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, please do.
...After all, it was a long day.

name: Yotaro
text:
I intended to leave much sooner...
Well, it's like they say,
"all's well that ends well".

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono, although we could not
cross swords this time, I was able to
fully witness your power.

name: Gaisei
text:
When your body has healed, I, this unworthy one,
will continue to train as always, so that I can
demonstrate my power at any time.

name: Orbiter
text:
Gaisei is really energetic, isn't he...?
I'm already exhausted
from today's adventure.

options.text: Yotaro-kun, good work to you too!

name: Yotaro
text:
...Well, I also learned about [Player],
so one objective has been achieved.

name: Yotaro
text:
Let's meet again if we have the chance.
Next time, I pray we won't be enemies, [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
You don't want to
make enemies of us, do you?

Laughing, Yotaro bowed his head.
Gaisei took a step forward before him,
and smiled gleefully.

name: Gaisei
text:
Pubraseer-dono and Orbiter-dono,
I shall look forward to
the time of battle with you.

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono,
let us meet again without fail.
If possible, on the battlefield.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Then, let's go home,
Gaisei-kun.
This time, please excuse us!

Saying that, Yotaro pulled
Gaisei by the sleeve and disappeared
into the shadows of the trees.

name: Orbiter
text:
That was a rather abrupt
farewell, wasn't it...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
It can't be helped,
they chose to be villains.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Even so, until the very end,
those two, what they were saying
was completely opposite...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Whether they wanted to
battle, or not...

name: Orbiter
text:
Hehe, but, they were
interesting people, weren't they!
It's more fun when a team is all different!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Unique members, huh?
Ah, that's right.

Pubraseer looked up.
He gently put his arms around [Player]'s and Orbiter's shoulders,
and faced the "Pillar of Light".

His eyes reflected a sense of relief
and accomplishment at having been able
to return to this place.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Well then, both of you.
'We' should return too.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Surely, everyone must be
waiting for our return.

name: Akashi
text:
—[Player]!!
Are you alright!?

Opening the ceremony hall gate,
Akashi leaped out from inside.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Really? You're not
hurt anywhere...?
You... You made me worried sick!

options.text: Everyone, I'm sorry for making you worry...

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1]

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...U-Ugh, shut up, shut up!
If your childhood friend is risking their life in space, everyone would naturally be worried!!

text:
Confirming [Player]'s safety,
Akashi let out a huge sigh.

name: Akashi
text:
Haa-...!
How did you go get drinks,
and then end up in space!!

name: Akashi
text:
Whatever reckless things you did,
I'll hear all about it
from Pubraseer-san later!

name: Ryekie
text:
...[Player],
I'm so glad you're safe!
Ah, you made me so worried...!!

name: Ryekie
text:
But, as expected of our company's Operator!!
You showed your justice!!!
Now, please rest well!!!!

Akashi, Ryekie, Huckle,
and all the members of Parallel Flight Inc.
were gathered in the ceremony hall.

name: Huckle
text:
[Player]-kun, and
Pubraseer-san and Orbiter-san.

name: Huckle
text:
...Truly.
I'm glad you all returned
without anyone missing.

name: Huckle
text:
I sincerely thank you for
keeping your promise to me.
Thank you all, truly.

name: Pubraseer
text:
No, President Huckle,
please raise your head.

name: Pubraseer
text:
This is a victory achieved as a team.
It wouldn't have been possible
if even one person was missing.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Of course, including everyone
who worked hard on the moon.
Allow me to express my gratitude as well.

name: Pubraseer
text:
If the [Orbiter] hadn't arrived,
it would have been difficult to create
a chance for a counterattack.

name: Crowne
text:
What, we just
did what we could.

name: Crowne
text:
It was a rushed job, you see.
I had some doubts, but
I'm glad it made it.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah-!
Thank you, Crowne!
Thanks to you, I had a great adventure!

name: Crowne
text:
Hehe, is that so? Well, that's good.
...By the way,
you built that yourself, didn't you?

name: Crowne
text:
If you're interested in space engineering,
I can give you advice. I'm actually
a professional in that field. I can help, you know?

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, really!?
Yay-!!
Thank you, Crowne-!!

Orbiter hopped around,
flapping his ears, in delight.

name: Exio
text:
...Again, [Player]-kun seems to
have accomplished the impossible.

name: Exio
text:
Well, this time, it's kind of my doing,
so I can't say anything.
...I'm glad you returned.

name: Exio
text:
You truly surprise me.
...I'd even say you
managed to astound me.

name: Melide
text:
While [Player] was in space, we also worked hard.
We managed to subjugate all the Kaibutsu
that appeared on the moon.

name: Mokdai
text:
Welcome back, [Player].
I believed in you,
that you would return.

name: Mokdai
text:
Surely, your body must be tired.
Leave the rest to us.

name: Mokdai
text:
Welcome back, Pubraseer-san and Orbiter-kun!
First, everyone, have some rest.

name: Sui
text:
My threads were useful too.
...That's good to know.

name: Sui
text:
Still, I was worried after all.
Thank you for returning,
...[Player]-san.

name: Yoshiori
text:
But, thanks to that,
the moon was safely defended.
It's all good in the end, right?

name: Melide
text:
Hehe, Yoshiori-niichan,
you were fidgeting a lot,
and very worried, you know.

name: Yoshiori
text:
What, no way!!
Don't just make things up,
it'll make things boring!!

name: Monomasa
text:
...What a noisy fellow.
[Player], are you tired?
If you need help, I'll lend a hand.

name: Monomasa
text:
...But first, there are people waiting for you.
Go talk to them first, please.

Monomasa turned his gaze
towards the back of the hall.

name: Orbiter
text: —Flamier, Andrew...!

Orbiter spotted the two figures
and ran off at full speed.

name: Flamier
text:
...Orbiter-san.
I'm truly glad you're safe.

name: Andrew
text:
Welcome back, Orbiter.
I've been worried about you.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Flamier, Andrew.
I'm sorry, because I
disappeared on my own...

name: Orbiter
text:
Also, I hit the ceiling and
activated the alarm system, didn't I...?

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm sure I caused a lot of trouble
for many people...
I have to apologize properly.

name: Andrew
text:
...I see, so that was
Orbiter's work, wasn't it?

name: Flamier
text:
Please don't blame yourself too much.
...Is your physical condition
alright everywhere?

name: Andrew
text:
You fell from the ceiling, right?
Orbiter, are you really okay?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah...
I'm fine, I'm energetic.
Nothing's 'broken'.

At Orbiter's words,
Andrew and Flamier were speechless for a moment.

name: Andrew
text: Orbiter, you...

name: Orbiter
text:
...I'm sorry, both of you.
I've been very selfish
until now.

name: Orbiter
text:
I worried everyone, and I've put everyone through trouble.
...But, I learned something from today's adventure.

name: Orbiter
text:
My body, only
I can understand it best.
So, I—

Orbiter quietly muttered,
mustering his courage.

name: Orbiter
text:
—I don't want to make everyone,
or myself, lie anymore.
That's how I feel now.

name: Flamier
text:
...Orbiter-san, how big
your worries are...
We had a chance to know.

name: Flamier
text:
However, instead of forcing the
issue on you, Orbiter-san, we decided to
wait until you were ready to talk—

name: Flamier
text:
That's what Andrew
and I were discussing.

name: Flamier
text:
...And yet, you must have
felt anxious all alone.
I apologize, Orbiter-san.

name: Andrew
text:
Orbiter, I feel the same way.
As your guarantor,
I want to help you more.

name: Andrew
text:
Let's talk a lot more.
I want you to tell me about yourself.
I promise I will help you.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Thank you, both of you.
Yeah, I want to talk a lot with you two too.
I love you both.

Orbiter quietly grasped [Player]'s hand,
which was beside him.
A little tightly, strongly.

name: Orbiter
text:
...This feeling is
proof that I 'am human'.

name: Orbiter
text:
This feeling isn't a lie or a mistake.
It's very much real—
[Player] has taught me that.

options.text: We should talk a lot too.

text:
Orbiter, slightly relieved by [Player]'s words,
smiled back happily.

name: Flamier
text:
...[Player]-sama.
Thank you very much for
watching over Orbiter-san.

name: Andrew
text:
I'll thank you too.
[Player]-san, thank you for
returning with Orbiter.

[Player] smiled and nodded.
Just then, Pubraseer called Orbiter.

name: Pubraseer
text:
—I apologize for interrupting
your important conversation.
Orbiter, your lost item has been found.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I had it sent here before
the reactor could be retrieved.
—Here it is.

Pubraseer took out the burnt and tattered
small spaceship and handed it to Orbiter.

It was beyond repair, with some parts melted
and the frame deformed.

name: Orbiter
text:
—This is, [Orbiter]...
It's been found...!
Thank you, Captain...!!

Orbiter gently took the distorted spaceship
as if it were a precious treasure, and hugged it tightly.

name: Orbiter
text:
............
Thank you, [Orbiter].
Thanks to you, I had a great adventure.

name: Orbiter
text:
I managed to fulfill
a little bit of my dream—
My dream, and that person's dream.

Orbiter quietly murmured
to the spaceship.

Then, slowly looking up,
Orbiter gazed directly
at Flamier and Andrew.

name: Orbiter
text:
Flamier, Andrew.
—I want to be a hero.

name: Orbiter
text:
I thought about it fighting
alongside Captain and [Player].
I still want to be an astronaut.

name: Orbiter
text:
It's also because it's a dream entrusted
to me by a precious person, but—
That's not all.

name: Orbiter
text: ...I found a dream that's just mine!

Orbiter glanced at Pubraseer and [Player],
then clenched his fist, determined.

name: Orbiter
text:
...I want to continue adventuring with Captain and [Player].
If possible, with Flamier and Andrew too.

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll become an astronaut and a hero,
and adventure endlessly through space.

name: Orbiter
text:
...And, someday, I want to know what kind of person
the one who entrusted me with their dream was,
and what they were thinking.

name: Flamier
text:
...Orbiter-san.
Yes, thank you for telling us.

name: Flamier
text:
It's a very wonderful dream.
I will support you as well.

name: Andrew
text:
Orbiter, we'll have to watch your body
a little more, but...

name: Andrew
text:
If it turns out you're fine, I'll talk to my agency.
Until then, please make sure to get proper check-ups, okay?

name: Orbiter
text:
Flamier, Andrew!
...Yay~!!
Yeah, I promise!

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player]...
Yeah, thank you!
I'll definitely do my best!

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, but to become a hero,
I have to take an exam
like Denebola, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Otherwise, even if I'm strong like Gaisei,
I'll become a villain, won't I...?

name: Denebola
text:
—Ah, that's right.
You're aiming to be a hero too...
You're just like me.

name: Orbiter
text:
Denebola!
Thank goodness, you're safe!

From behind the group, Denebola,
Hydoor, and Subaru walked up.

options.text: All three of you, good work!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Subaru
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not like I like wearing this.
I just didn't have time to change.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I would have been perfectly fine staying like this!
I still look the coolest!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text: Besides, if you're going to say that, Pubraseer has been in his civilian role outfit this whole time too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah. In the end, I never had the chance to say my lines about being taken hostage by you villains...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, let's reflect on the examiners' job later.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Everyone, thank you so much for
stopping the Kaibutsu's advance at
the entrance of the "Pillar of Light".

name: Pubraseer
text:
Denebola, I'm glad you're safe too.
I heard you had rejoined, and you did well
protecting the rescued people alone.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, the fact that almost no Kaibutsu
appeared was a blessing in disguise.

name: Orbiter
text:
That's great!
The examiners are also
awake, right?

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, their memories are normal, and
they're fully conscious.
They should be fine soon, apparently.

Even as he said that,
Denebola's expression was a little
downcast.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...What's wrong, Denebola?
For someone who said there was no problem,
your expression seems gloomy...

name: Denebola
text:
A-Ah...
Actually, because of the Kaibutsu commotion,
the exam was canceled.

name: Denebola
text:
I need to stay until the re-examination, but...
The spaceship I prepared with what little money
I had to come to the moon was caught in the crossfire.

name: Denebola
text:
It's hard to work as a bounty hunter
without a ship. I don't have money, and
I want to work, but I can't.

name: Denebola
text:
...Living expenses are also piling up, and
I still have the spaceship loan to pay off,
so why did this happen to me...?

Denebola looked up at the deep night sky
with distant eyes.
Then, he shook his head slightly, returning to reality.

name: Denebola
text:
...Well, my determination to work as a dish washer
is trivial compared to the survival of the colony.

name: Denebola
text:
For now,
let's celebrate your safety...

name: Orbiter
text:
...Denebola, he's so down in
the dumps, would he be okay...?

Flamier approached Denebola,
who was dejected.

name: Flamier
text:
—In that case, Denebola-sama.
What do you think
of giving us a hand?

name: Flamier
text:
The license exam will likely depend on
the confirmation of the Kaibutsu's damage and
the timing of the ceremony's resumption, but—

name: Flamier
text:
We need manpower to restore the areas
where people have temporarily evacuated the colony,
and where battles have taken place.

name: Flamier
text:
As a member of the Archimedes Group,
I believe we can assist you
in the form of temporary employment.

name: Flamier
text:
Of course, we will also arrange
accommodation during your stay.
Please do consider it.

name: Subaru
text:
...Speaking of which, Denebola-san
was an examinee hoping to acquire
a license, wasn't he?

name: Subaru
text:
In such a critical situation, your actions were precise.
There are people whose lives were saved by your judgment.

name: Subaru
text:
...Although it's not usually my nature,
but since we've come this far,
I too will lend my humble assistance.

name: Subaru
text:
Hydoor-san and I will also submit
a recommendation to the agency.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Huh?
Dammit, teach, I wasn't told about this!
Do I have to do it too?

name: Subaru
text:
Yes, it will be easier to find an agency
that suits Denebola-san if it's not just me.

name: Hydoor
text:
Tch, fine, I get it.
I'll do it, I'll do it.
...Hey, Denebola, right?

name: Hydoor
text:
You're making me do something so troublesome
as submitting a recommendation, so you better pass
the exam on your first try!

name: Subaru
text:
Well, there were many examiners who witnessed
your deeds this time, so I think there won't be
any problem even without our recommendation.

name: Denebola
text: ...Huh?

Denebola, unable to grasp the situation,
froze in his tracks,
and stopped moving entirely.

options.text: A recommendation from a real examiner, huh...
Pubraseer-san also saw it, didn't he!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, of course, I'll also submit a recommendation.
Denebola should be fine.

name: Denebola
text:
N-No way... such a lucky thing
is happening to me...!
I-I can't believe it...!

name: Denebola
text:
After living for 28 years,
to think... Such a day
would come...!!

name: Orbiter
text:
...Denebola, a-are you okay?
Are you perhaps, crying?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hahaha, Denebola,
if you become a hero,
you can't cry anymore.

name: Pubraseer
text:
We managed to defend this colony,
but many parts of the ceremony and
examination venue were damaged.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Let's all work together so that everyone
living in this colony can spend their time
in peace and safety.

name: Denebola
text:
O-Okay!
Of course, leave it to me!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll help too!
After all, I'm a future
astronaut hero!

options.text: Make sure to get some rest first!

text:
At [Player]'s words,
the proud heroes who defended the moon
nodded in response.

—No matter how difficult,
as long as they are heroes, they must defeat
the encroaching threats.

...That is something only heroes can do.
Something only heroes are capable of.

For 200 years straight—
It has been a baton protected and passed down.

—Earth, Japan,
Orient City.

Although the ceremony on the moon was interrupted,
the festival celebrating the 200th anniversary of heroes' birth
was also held on Earth.

People walking through the streets
were bustling, and everyone was laughing
and enjoying themselves as usual.

name: Passerby
text:
-Oh, hey, look at the moon!
Amazing...!
The full moon is glowing blue...!

name: Passerby
text:
...It's beautiful, the blue moon.
I've never seen it before.

name: Passerby
text:
You're right, it's amazing!
It's glowing blue-!
Hey, let's take a picture together!

Someone's words spread,
and one after another, many people
looked up at the moon.

name: Passerby
text:
Ah, it's so beautiful.
I'm truly glad—
I got to see this scenery.

—Even when unseen by anyone,
the stars shine, illuminating their surroundings.

And the moon, too, twinkles.
So that, someday, this light
may reach someone.

—To tear through the darkness,
to light up the sea of space.

Live A Hero! Special Edition
"The Glorious Rising Moon"
—END
